name: Web Search
description: Performs web searches (DuckDuckGo by default) and lightweight surf/follow-up across results.

provider.label: Provider
provider.help: duckduckgo requires no API key. serper needs apiKey.

maxResults.label: Max Results
maxResults.help: How many results to fetch per search.

rotations.label: Surf Depth
rotations.help: How many follow-up hops to fetch when surfing.

maxTokens.label: Token Budget
maxTokens.help: Approx tokens to spend per search batch.
